job.title: Senior Software Engineer and Team Leader (1308)
job.description:
About The Position

We are looking for an experienced full-stack software engineer to join our software development team with experience designing, building and scaling microservices in a cloud environment. You’ll be working with a team of software engineers to create microservices in AWS, making thousands of Single Digits networks more user-friendly, reliable and scalable. You will follow Agile DevOps processes, build exciting new features, and deliver those features using our automated CI/CD process. Engineers in this position must either have experience with the networking industry, or be quick to learn new skills.

Roles And Responsibilities
  • Design and develop reliable and scalable microservices in AWS using Java, React.js, Docker, and AWS platform technologies
  • Design and implement REST APIs using OpenAPI
  • Lead a team of software engineers using Agile DevOps processes and procedures
  • Collaborate with customers and functional experts to understand technical requirements and provide innovative solutions.
  • Other duties as assigned


Requirements
  • 5-7 years of experience with building scalable event-based microservices with Java and AWS platform services such as EventBridge
  • Experience with DevOps processes in AWS, including EKS and Terraform.
  • Experience with SQL using AWS RDS, as well as NoSQL using DynamoDB
  • 1-3 years of team leadership
  • Working knowledge of the networking industry is preferred, including familiarity with networking protocols such as TCP/IP and SNMP as well as experience with access points, switches and firewalls.
  • Scrum master certification preferred
